name: Soulbound (RelativeParadox)
description:
You can play Soulbound online at https://errantflux.com/game/Soulbound.html

You are a Battle Mage tasked with saving the world from encroching darkness by defeating the god Mal. As an oculus you have the ability to cast spells at the cost of your own life force, lum. Bewarned there are many dangers ahead of you, but with your trusty sword Nightkeeper blessed by the godess Atlas herself who can really stop you?

Further development and future updates will be on Errant Flux at https://errantflux.com/ and here on the community board!
